cn.description:
【开场白 - 致每一位侠士】
少侠，欢迎归来。
       你是否曾梦想过，身无长物，踏入一个波澜壮阔的开放世界，从市井小巷的无名之辈，一步步成长为名震天下的侠客、宗师，或是……颠覆武林的枭雄？

       时隔四年，白玉京工作室携《下一站江湖Ⅱ》与大家再度相遇！这次，我们为你准备好了一个完完整整的江湖世界：
       “这不是一条被安排好的旅途，而是一张等待你落墨的空白画卷。”
       “在这个江湖里，没有固定的剧本。你想成为什么样的人，学习什么样的武功，经历什么样的故事，结交什么样的朋友（或敌人），都取决于你自己。”
       “你的每一个选择，都将在此激起千层浪，谱写独一无二的江湖传奇。”

【核心特色：这就是你从未体验过的江湖】
1. “移动端首款”：独属于你的无缝武侠大世界，真实武林画卷
       无读条世界：告别加载画面！我们打造了一个面积达256平方公里的无缝大世界——中原、江南、西域、南疆……从熙攘繁华的古城街市，到人迹罕至的雪山秘境，所有场景皆可自由探索。
       活的江湖： 动态昼夜、真实天气、万物交互（可破坏环境、可拾取万物）。世界不仅仅是背景，更是可互动的舞台。
       无拘束体验：轻功飞跃山河，踏波而行，攀爬峭壁。你的武侠梦，不再受地形束缚。
（我们的核心是创造一个‘无界’的武侠世界。在这里，地图没有空气墙，探索没有读条，整个世界是连贯、可交互、充满生机的）

2. “1代最受欢迎的玩法”：千种武学心法，自由搭配的武侠战斗
       没有僵化的“职业”限制！我们提供了超过数百种内功、外功、轻功、技艺。你可以是刀剑双绝的豪侠，也可以是精通音律、以琴音伤人的雅士，甚至是暗器毒术无双的“邪派”高手。
       武学招式不再是一成不变的按键循环。我们采用“无规则”战斗系统，所有的招式心均可自由搭配、组合，形成你自己的套路。是追求一击必杀的极致爆发，还是操控全场连绵不绝的控制？战斗的策略与乐趣，完全交由你决定。

3. “你的江湖”：高自由度的人生，你的选择就是规则
       江湖不是非黑即白。你的每一个抉择都将引发难以预料的“因果链”。救下一个路人，他可能是你未来宗门的引荐人；偷听一桩秘密，或许会让你卷入颠覆王朝的阴谋。
       你可以选择拜入名门正派恪守门规，也可以加入诡谲魔教随心所欲，更可以做个散人，逍遥自在。甚至可以完全抛开打打杀杀，成为一名富甲天下的商贾、巧夺天工的匠人，或是悬壶济世的神医。这个世界，认可你的每一种活法。


4. “高达700万字文本内容，庞大玩法量级”：沙盒奇遇，隐藏要素无处不在
       《下一站江湖Ⅱ》的世界是“活”的。NPC们有自己的生活轨迹和喜怒哀乐。你可能在悬崖下发现前辈遗骸，学到失传绝学；也可能因为一碗酒，结交到一位隐世高人。
       大量未在任务列表中标注的“奇遇”事件散落在世界各个角落。探索的回报远超你的想象，真正的宝藏，永远留给最好奇的旅人。

5. “市井百业，多维度沉浸身份”：技艺百态，感受江湖的烟火气
       江湖不止有武功。我们深度嵌入了数十种生活技艺：采矿、采药、锻造、制琴、弈棋、书法、绘画、厨艺……这些不仅仅是赚钱的手段，更是提升角色能力、解锁特殊剧情和关卡的钥匙。一门精湛的技艺，同样能让你名动江湖。

【故事背景：游戏基础框架】（持续更新）
700万文字庞大世界观: 战国末期，三国、百家、江湖！
1.角色扮演:
①多出身多结局，每个主角都是全新体验（当前已有将门之子、富家千金、寒门书生、江湖浪子、无名小卒等五大出身300多万字主线剧情接近20个结局）
2.市井身份：
①数十种各具特色的市井身份极其对应的独立剧情、规则玩法。比如刺客身份对应青衣楼的门派玩法、以及相关的数十万字独立剧情，独有的悬赏及刺杀玩法等
3.江湖霸图：模拟经营、骑砍LIKE、世界建造
①数十个可加入的各具特色的门派
②每个门派都有自己的独立剧情以及与其他门派的恩怨情仇，比如狂刀门和绝剑门的火烧凌云窟大型剧情
③每个门派都有自己独有的晋升体系，以及规则：比如少林的从扫地僧至罗汉堂首座，敲钟玩法及铜人阵
④每个门派都有自己独有的武学、心法体系
⑤每个门派都能模拟经营、占领大世界的比如矿山青楼，并开启对应的经营
⑥每个门派都能如同骑马与砍杀一样世界争霸
4.自由成长：习百家武学，走你自己的江湖之路

【致玩家的话 - 来自制作人】
       各位侠士，大家好，我是《下一站江湖Ⅱ》的制作人。
       自第一部作品以来，我们聆听了无数玩家的心声。大家渴望一个更自由、更真实、更庞大的江湖。为此，我们团队呕心沥血数年，致力于打造这个无缝开放的武侠沙盒世界。
       它可能还不够完美，但它承载了我们对于“仗剑江湖”的所有梦想。在这里，你没有“必须完成”的主线，没有“必须击败”的敌人，只有你想走的路和想成为的人。
       我们希望《下一站江湖Ⅱ》能成为你忙碌生活中的一片世外桃源，一个可以随时沉浸其中、感受刀光剑影与人间烟火的第二人生。
       8月27日，我们在江湖等你。期待与你，江湖相逢！

【最后，江湖依然有不少问题：各位大侠在支持我们之前，一定要看下，我们将持续更新迭代】
1.在上作结束时，有部分大侠向我们建议“刚刚天下无敌，主线故事结束游戏就结束了”，因此“本作中，我们将尽量延长大侠们的江湖体验，主线结束并不意味着游戏结束”。为了实现这点，我们选择了主线、奇遇、门派、骑砍、经营、建造、身份等多维度的开放世界打造方式，同时规划了长达5年的游戏内容资料片更新计划（也是为了弥补上作遗憾）
a)因此内容量及其庞大，导致新手很难（建议一周目可以看下TAP社区官方攻略、进官微群交流、或者咨询游戏里的AI“江湖游记”及“江湖百晓生”）：
b)部分历史BUG遗留：已持续修改BUG3000余个，剩余极少部分将在后续更新持续解决
c)每次资料片更新有可能会带来全新BUG，不过我们会在接到反馈的第一时间修复（受限于团队规模，这块反馈主要依赖于第三方工作室的测试和大侠们的反馈、先在这里给大家跪谢）

2.这次我们首次将无缝大世界技术用在移动端，面临诸多适配和发热的问题，这里有一份我们整理的主流机型玩江湖2时的性能、发热及卡顿情况表现反馈；各位大侠可以点击查阅：“购买须知”（同时我们在其中规划了剩余机型适配、卡顿优化及发热分批次的更新方案和时间）

       最后，再次感谢各位大侠的支持！我们的确有不少遗憾、有诸多不足，我们也是比较菜鸡的团队哈哈！但是所有问题，遗憾我们都会面对、正视，将尽力在后续的更新中逐步解决（部分在这一代无法实现的，我们将在下作中解决）
1.欢迎大家随时通过社区、官微群联系我们提出问题和建议：本作还有5年20多个玩法DLC持续更新计划，我们尽力帮大家完善“属于你的江湖”
2.当前版本，已上线1年零4个月：已完成133次更新、11部玩法资料片、1部优化向资料片

       白玉京，与大家再会！

cn.trackName: 巧摄专业版：风光摄影计划神器
cn.description:
请订阅PlanItPhoto微信公众号，查看更多的精彩文章和教程。我们的另外有个免费应用巧摄现场版也已经发布。

免费中文视频教学：
YouTube：
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbfOTOEQhi3klBpHP952Y9je
哔哩哔哩：
https://space.bilibili.com/382927099/channel/seriesdetail?sid=2490499


另外我们还有20个小时的收费直播课。欢迎订阅我们的微信公众号了解更多信息。

也许您正在寻找一个这样的应用，可以帮助您计划风光摄影的各种细节。那恭喜您，真的不用再找了，巧摄专业版就是梦寐以求的应用。不管您喜欢风光摄影的哪个方面，旅行，城市，自然，夜景，星空，银河，星轨，延时，这个应用都可以帮助到您。

著名美国摄影师安塞尔•亚当斯在他的第一本书《Taos Pueblo》强调了“可视化”的概念。他提出“预可视化”，也就是说摄影师应该在按下快门之前就想像出最后出来的照片会使怎样。当然，很多伟大的照片是即兴拍摄出来的，但是对于风光摄影师来说，如果可以提前预见到场景的样子会很大程度上避免因为没有准备好而错失良机，也会大大增加出好片的机会。

现在科技发达，摄影师可以使用很多不同的工具实现场景的预可视化。当然，手机应用就是很多这样的工具之一，而且越来越流行。我们这个巧摄专业版就是这样的一个全功能的应用。它巧妙地利用地图结合各种摄影工具和日月银河星历功能，来实现场景预可视化。

在这个看似简单的应用里面，我们加了很多的功能。比如说任何地点的GPS坐标、海拔高度、两点距离、海拔高度差、以及从某一点是否可以看到某个景点。这些信息不单对摄影师，可能对很多热爱旅游的人来说，都是重要的。而对摄影师，我们还专门提供了焦距（水平方向和垂直方向），景深、超焦距和全景工具。不仅如此，我们还加入了星历表的功能。这样您就可以查到任何一天任何地点的日出日落时间、月出月落时间、曙暮光开始结束时间、黄金时段、蓝色时段。甚至任何时刻的太阳和月亮的位置你都可以查到。还有星星、星座、银河、星云的位置。另外还有星轨计算器和延时摄影计算器功能，曝光自动计算，ND滤镜计算器，光度计，彩虹位置预测，部分国家的潮汐数据。可以说是风光摄影需要的功能，应有尽有。和其它类似应用不同的是我们这个应用把上面提到的所有功能都在地图上或者取景框方式下直观地显示出来，各个功能之间还可以结合使用。

风光摄影是我们对自然界的探险。 我们知道您在外面探索时，可能会没有任何网络。 巧摄专业版当然知道这个，所以只要您预装离线海拔文件和离线mbtiles地图，您可以完全离线使用该应用程序，而无需网络连接。

许可协议：https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
隐私声明：https://planitphoto.cn/privacy.html

为将您的体验提升到全新水平，我们带来了三项令人惊叹的新功能：
• 升级版 VoiceOver：提供更清晰、详细的描述，让视障用户使用更便捷。
• 智能预测搜索：实时推荐，让您几秒钟内找到所需内容。

cn.description:
我们的应用实时连接到YouTube，让您播放任何视频，并拥有专为您设计的独家功能！
主要功能亮点：
• 锁屏播放：在后台持续收听您视频的音频。
• 浮动播放（画中画）：在观看视频时使用其他应用。
• 睡眠定时器：设置自动关闭，安心放松。
• 循环模式：无限循环播放您喜欢的视频。
此外还包括：
• 可切换字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 质量选择和全屏模式
• 智能搜索，实时建议（预测搜索）
• 上传日期筛选：按天、周、月或年
FyTube非常适合不想错过任何喜欢主题视频的用户。
尽情探索、播放并享受您喜爱的内容——无干扰！

特别功能
浮动播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他应用时继续观看视频。
只需进入全屏模式，点击画中画按钮——它是播放器顶部的第二个图标。
无论打开哪个应用，您的视频都会浮动在屏幕顶部！

锁屏播放
无中断收听！
即使屏幕关闭，也能继续享受视频音频。非常适合开车或休息时听音乐、播客或喜欢的曲目。
如何激活？
只需锁定设备屏幕，即刻会看到后台播放器。
点击播放——音频将持续不断。

睡眠定时器
安然入睡——应用会自动停止！
启用此功能后，视频将在您设定的时间后自动停止。非常适合睡觉或小憩，无需担心忘记关闭。
如何激活？
点击定时器按钮，选择运行时间，就完成了。
放松，剩下的交给应用！

循环模式
反复播放您喜欢的视频！
启用此功能，视频会自动重复播放任意次数。
怎么知道它是否开启？

hk.description:
HUDDLE UP FOR BACKYARD FOOTBALL

Backyard Football 1999 is now enhanced to run on modern systems. Whether you're picking Jerry Rice or Barry Sanders for your dream team, rushing with Pete Wheeler, scoring touchdowns with Pablo Sanchez, or enjoying the witty banter of hosts Sunny Day and Chuck Downfield, simple controls let anyone pick up and play football!

GAME MODES
Single Game: With 5 backyard fields and unique weather condition settings, players can pick their team, design their team logos, and play a pick-up game!
Season Mode: Players can draft seven players from the 30 iconic Backyard Sports characters and a collection of legendary pros including Barry Sanders, Jerry Rice, John Elway, Dan Marino, Randall Cunningham, Drew Bledsoe and Steve Young to compete against 15 other teams in the Backyard Football League. Each team plays a 14-game season. By the end of the regular season, the 4 division champions and 4 wild card teams enter the Backyard Football League Playoffs to compete for the Super Colossal Cereal Bowl!

EARN CLASSIC POWER UPS
Earn power-ups by completing passes on offense and sacking the opposing QB on defense.

Offensive
• Hocus Pocus – A pass play which results in a receiver teleporting down field.
• Sonic Boom – A run play which causes an earthquake to knock over the opposing team.
• Leap Frog – A run play which causes your running back to leap down field.
• Super Punt – A very powerful punt!

Defensive
• Cough Drop – A play that causes the opponent to fumble when tackled.
• Chameleon – A trick play that results in your team wearing the other team's colors for ultimate confusion.
• Spring Loaded – A play that causes your player to leap over the line of scrimmage to sack the QB.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. However, Backyard Football ‘99 runs well, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez!
Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master!
Game Modes:
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)!
Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball!
T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field!
 
BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES
The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules:
No leading off
No Injuries
Bunting is allowed
Tagging up is allowed
Stealing is allowed
 
At our core, we are fans first–not just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.

hk.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

hk.description:
An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets.

Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, or use two thumbs like a traditional controller. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket.


About the Author:
Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

hk.description:
《Kingdom Eighties》為獲獎遊戲《Kingdom》系列的獨立擴充，以80年代霓虹元素為靈感，帶你踏上壯闊的輕策略基地建造單人冒險之旅。

你將化身夏令營的年輕輔導員「老大」，抵禦神祕貪婪生物的無情攻擊，保護自己的家人和小鎮。這些怪物是什麼來頭，為什麼想搶走你的傳家寶「創造王冠」？

招募鄰居家的孩子，為他們分配建造或作戰任務，花費金幣建設王國，再修建城牆和防禦砲塔。晚上時務必多加小心，貪婪生物將趁著夜幕對你發動無情襲擊。要是丟掉王冠，麻煩就大了！

《Kingdom》系列的每部作品都會藏有各種祕密。仔細探索場景，解鎖坐騎，發現技術升級與武器，還要如何學習合理統籌資源，才能生存下去。

《Kingdom》系列新舊玩家都不容錯過的作品

《Kingdom Eighties》以本系列為人熟知的遊戲機制為基礎，大幅度豐富這系列的敘事與世界觀。即便是初次接觸《Kingdom》系列，劇情元素也會流暢地引導你瞭解遊戲的各項機制。

認識你的小夥伴

你將陸續認識三位配角：切普、緹克兒和烏茲，三人各有各的本領，可以助你解謎破關。

炫酷上路

夏令營只是一切的開始！你將前往《Kingdom》系列從未出現過的地方，去滑板公園找新輪子，光顧大街上的商店，趕走新國度購物中心的貪婪生物。

當像素美術遇上合成波音樂

《Kingdom》系列經典的手繪美術風格回來了，這次還直接參考了80年代的霓虹美學。伴著 Andreas Hald 創作的合成波原聲樂，回到隨心騎車和夏令營的美妙時代，回到一切似乎皆有可能的從前。

• 微調畫面、聲音、平衡性和介面。
hk.description:
神祕的面紗籠罩著這片未知的中世紀大地，古老的紀念碑、遺跡和神話般的生物在此等待你的到來。往昔時代的回音訴說著過去的偉大，《Kingdom Two Crowns》是屢獲殊榮的《Kingdom》系列遊戲的一部分，你將化身君主，踏上冒險之旅。在這趟橫軸冒險旅程中，騎上坐騎，徵召忠誠的臣民，建設你的王國，同時還得保護王冠不被貪婪生物奪走——這些駭人的怪物滿心想著將王國的寶藏偷個一乾二淨。

建造
建造高聳的城牆和瞭望塔，為強大王國奠定基礎，同時建造農場、徵召村民，使王國欣欣向榮。在《Kingdom Two Crowns》中，你可以開疆闢土、增強國力，逐步獲得新的臣民兵將和技術。
  
探索
探索疆域以外的未知之地，穿過偏僻的森林和古老的廢墟，尋找寶藏和隱藏的知識，協助你一路冒險。誰知道你會發現什麼傳奇神器或神話生靈呢？

防禦
隨著夜幕降臨，暗影開始甦醒，駭人的貪婪生物也將襲擊你的王國。召集軍隊、鼓起勇氣、磨練自己，你必須不斷增長自身的戰術技巧，才有望夜復一夜地保住性命。部署弓箭手、騎士、攻城武器，甚至是新獲得的君主能力和神器，抵禦一波又一波襲來的貪婪生物。 

征服
你作為一國之君，需要親自率軍攻擊貪婪生物的源頭，才能保護轄下諸島。派遣麾下部隊挺身迎敵。注意：請確保你的軍隊兵精糧足，因為貪婪生物不會不戰而降。  

未知的島嶼
《Kingdom Two Crowns》帶給玩家不斷進化的遊戲體驗，包含幾項免費內容更新：

• 《Shogun》：造訪新國度，探索以日本封建時代的文化與建築為靈感的場景。成為強大的幕府將軍或女武士，謀取忍者支持、駕馭傳說中的麒麟來率領部隊作戰，並運籌帷幄，無畏面對躲在重重竹林內的敵人。

• 《Dead Lands》：深入王國的黑暗之地。化身成獨一無二、擁有強大特質的君主，例如哥德式恐怖動作RPG遊戲《血咒之城：暗夜儀式》的碎片人米利暗。

• 挑戰島：對於久經沙場的老練君主來說，這是有史以來最大的挑戰。迎接五項規則和目標各不相同的挑戰。你能活得夠久，奪得最終的金王冠嗎？

還可透過 App 內購取得新的 DLC：

• 《Norse Lands》：在這款維京主題的擴充內容裡仰仗北歐諸神的力量、指揮彪悍的軍隊，打造維京風格的兵械，並破解謎題吧。

• 《Call of Olympus》：進入以古希臘為背景的大型擴充內容，探索古老傳說中的島嶼，尋求眾神恩典，抵禦陣容空前的貪婪生物大軍。

你的冒險才剛剛開始。君主啊，請保持警戒，因為黑夜就要來臨，保護好你的王冠！

hk.releaseNotes:
Greetings, Property Tycoons!


We have been busy eliminating bugs, enriching features and providing you with investment opportunities!
And we’ve got a new limited-time event running in MONOPOLY!


Log in and check it out today!
hk.description:
Play MONOPOLY on the go without distractions – no ads, no fuss! 

Challenge friends, family and fans from around the globe in the digital version of the official MONOPOLY board game, licensed by Hasbro. 

Head online to play your favourite board game with anyone, anywhere, at any time, or compete against state-of-the-art AI opponents offline. Plus, with the seamless PASS & PLAY mode, you can play the classic MONOPOLY board game with your friends with just one device! 

The classic MONOPOLY board game takes a bold leap into a new format, arriving on mobile with amazing graphics, smooth animations and a catchy soundtrack! 


HOW TO PLAY MONOPOLY

1. Download the official MONOPOLY app
2. Press “PLAY”
3. Pick a mode, board, dice and token
4. Roll the dice and move around the board
5. If you land on a property tile, you can buy it
6. Collect rent when other players land on it
7. Continue around the board, drawing cards when instructed – will you be hit with a surprise tax? Sent to jail? Or get a little bonus money? 
8. If you run out of money, you’ll be bankrupt and out of the game
9. The last player left with a profit wins! 

FEATURES

- MONOPOLY ON THE GO – No connection? No problem. Our roster of AI opponents are ready to challenge you! Or play with your friends offline with Pass & Play! 
- MULTIPLE MODES – Take on AI opponents in Single Player or compete against friends and family in Pass & Play or Online With Friends. Try out Online Multiplayer and face off against fellow tycoons from around the world! 
- EXCLUSIVE BOARDS – Experience the iconic board game like never before with exclusive boards and more! 
- AWESOME NEW TOKENS AND DICE – Whatever your style, MONOPOLY has a set of dice fit for a future tycoon! Pick from nostalgic classic tokens or brand-new designs exclusive to the mobile game.

Get the most authentic MONOPOLY experience with the official MONOPOLY mobile game!

The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the gameboard, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment. © 1935, 2025 Hasbro. All Rights Reserved.

hk.description:
請訂閱PlanItPhoto微信公衆號，檢視更多的精彩文章和教程。我們的另外有個免費應用巧攝現場版也已經發布。

44集免費中文視頻教學：
YouTube:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbfOTOEQhi3klBpHP952Y9je
嗶哩嗶哩：
https://space.bilibili.com/382927099/channel/seriesdetail?sid=2490499

另外我們還有20個小時的收費直播課。歡迎訂閱我們的微信公衆號瞭解更多資訊。

也許您正在尋找一個這樣的應用，可以說明您計劃風光攝影的各種細節。那恭喜您，真的不用再找了，巧攝專業版就是夢寐以求的應用。不管您喜歡風光攝影的哪個方面，旅遊，城市，自然，夜景，星空，銀河，星軌，縮時，這個應用都可以說明到您。

著名美國攝影師安塞爾•亞當斯在他的第一本書《Taos Pueblo》強調了“可視化”的概念。他提出“預可視化”，也就是說攝影師應該在按下快門之前就想像出最後出來的照片會使怎樣。當然，很多偉大的照片是即興拍攝出來的，但是對於風光攝影師來說，如果可以提前預見到場景的樣子會很大程度上避免因爲沒有準備好而錯失良機，也會大大增加出好片的機會。

現在科技發達，攝影師可以使用很多不同的工具實現場景的預可視化。當然，手機應用就是很多這樣的工具之一，而且越來越流行。我們這個巧攝專業版就是這樣的一個全功能的應用。它巧妙地利用地圖結合各種攝影工具和日月銀河星曆功能，來實現場景預可視化。

在這個看似簡單的應用裏面，我們加了很多的功能。比如說任何地點的GPS座標、海拔高度、兩點距離、海拔高度差、以及從某一點是否可以看到某個景點。這些資訊不單對攝影師，可能對很多熱愛旅遊的人來說，都是重要的。而對攝影師，我們還專門提供了焦距（水平方向和垂直方向），景深、超焦距和全景工具。不僅如此，我們還加入了星曆錶的功能。這樣您就可以查到任何一天任何地點的日出日落時間、月出月落時間、曙暮光開始結束時間、黃金時段、藍色時段。甚至任何時刻的太陽和月亮的位置你都可以查到。還有星星、星座、銀河、星雲的位置。另外還有星軌計算器和縮時攝影計算器功能，曝光自動計算，ND濾鏡計算器，光度計，彩虹位置預測，部分國家的潮汐資料。可以說是風光攝影需要的功能，應有盡有。和其它類似應用不同的是我們這個應用把上面提到的所有功能都在地圖上或者取景框方式下直觀地顯示出來，各個功能之間還可以結合使用。

風光攝影是我們對自然界的探險。 我們知道您在外面探索時，可能會沒有任何網路。 巧攝專業版當然知道這個，所以只要您預裝離線海拔檔案和離線mbtiles地圖，您可以完全離線使用該應用程式，而無需網路連接。

許可協議：https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
隱私聲明：https://planitphoto.cn/privacy.html

hk.description:
Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience.

Some of the key features that VidHub offers include:
- Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud
- Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv, and more
- High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions
- The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB
- Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services.
- Support downloading and deleting cloud files
- Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method.
- Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server.
- Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more.

All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire.

Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community.

hk.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

hk.description:
《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？

 - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！

 - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。

- 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。

 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。

 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。

 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。

 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

hk.releaseNotes:
更新 1.7：過去的陰影

來自一處被遺忘的設施的微弱無線電訊號或許能拯救文明的未來。但要抵達那裡，勇敢的倖存者必須深入舊世界致命的核心……

- 新戰役：在廢墟中發現被遺忘的研究實驗室，共 10 個新關卡
- 感染邊境：對抗籠罩該區域的遠端感染
- 文明擴張：利用前哨據點提升你的定居點，並新增建築、人口與科技等級
hk.description:
瘟疫公司之后会发生什么？

你能在僵尸启示录之后重建文明吗？瘟疫公司》是一款融合了战略模拟、生存城市建设和 "迷你 4X "的独特游戏。

在 Necroa 病毒肆虐人类数十年后，少数幸存者出现了。在塑造末世社会的过程中，您可以建造定居点、探索、搜刮资源并进行扩张。世界是绿色和美丽的，但危险潜伏在废墟之中！


瘟疫公司》是有史以来最受欢迎的游戏之一，拥有超过 1.9 亿玩家。After Inc. 画面精美，玩法广受好评，是一款引人入胜、简单易学的游戏。建立多个定居点，在持久的战役中获得能力，带领人类走出黑暗。

公益广告：与我们的其他游戏不同，我很高兴地说，《After Inc.现在还不用担心现实生活中的僵尸启示录... 


瘟疫公司》之后会发生什么？

功能：
做出艰难的决定--孩子是负担不起的奢侈品吗？狗是宠物还是食物来源？民主还是专制？
探索美丽的末世后的英国
● 利用过去的废墟搜刮/收获资源
● 用住房、农场、伐木场等扩建您的定居点、
● 消灭僵尸侵扰，保卫人类
● 发掘古老技术，研究新技术
● 塑造你的社会，提供服务，让你的人民幸福
● 在持久战役中建立多个定居点，提升能力等级
● 基于真实生活研究的超逼真僵尸行为建模… ：P
● 由您的决定决定复杂的叙事算法
● 5 个具有完全不同能力的独特领袖
● 不需要互联网连接
● 没有 "消耗性微交易"。扩展包'一次购买，永久畅玩'
● 将在未来数年内不断更新。

特价销售，庆祝游戏上市！


◈◈◈


我有很多更新计划！请与我联系，告诉我您想看到什么。

詹姆斯（设计师）


联系我：

www.ndemiccreations.com/en/1-support
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

mo.description:
HUDDLE UP FOR BACKYARD FOOTBALL

Backyard Football 1999 is now enhanced to run on modern systems. Whether you're picking Jerry Rice or Barry Sanders for your dream team, rushing with Pete Wheeler, scoring touchdowns with Pablo Sanchez, or enjoying the witty banter of hosts Sunny Day and Chuck Downfield, simple controls let anyone pick up and play football!

GAME MODES
Single Game: With 5 backyard fields and unique weather condition settings, players can pick their team, design their team logos, and play a pick-up game!
Season Mode: Players can draft seven players from the 30 iconic Backyard Sports characters and a collection of legendary pros including Barry Sanders, Jerry Rice, John Elway, Dan Marino, Randall Cunningham, Drew Bledsoe and Steve Young to compete against 15 other teams in the Backyard Football League. Each team plays a 14-game season. By the end of the regular season, the 4 division champions and 4 wild card teams enter the Backyard Football League Playoffs to compete for the Super Colossal Cereal Bowl!

EARN CLASSIC POWER UPS
Earn power-ups by completing passes on offense and sacking the opposing QB on defense.

Offensive
• Hocus Pocus – A pass play which results in a receiver teleporting down field.
• Sonic Boom – A run play which causes an earthquake to knock over the opposing team.
• Leap Frog – A run play which causes your running back to leap down field.
• Super Punt – A very powerful punt!

Defensive
• Cough Drop – A play that causes the opponent to fumble when tackled.
• Chameleon – A trick play that results in your team wearing the other team's colors for ultimate confusion.
• Spring Loaded – A play that causes your player to leap over the line of scrimmage to sack the QB.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. However, Backyard Football ‘99 runs well, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez!
Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master!
Game Modes:
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)!
Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball!
T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field!
 
BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES
The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules:
No leading off
No Injuries
Bunting is allowed
Tagging up is allowed
Stealing is allowed
 
At our core, we are fans first–not just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.

mo.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

mo.description:
An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets.

Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, or use two thumbs like a traditional controller. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket.


About the Author:
Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

mo.releaseNotes: Added japanese localisation and updated credits
mo.description:
《Kingdom Eighties》為獲獎遊戲《Kingdom》系列的獨立擴充，以80年代霓虹元素為靈感，帶你踏上壯闊的輕策略基地建造單人冒險之旅。

你將化身夏令營的年輕輔導員「老大」，抵禦神祕貪婪生物的無情攻擊，保護自己的家人和小鎮。這些怪物是什麼來頭，為什麼想搶走你的傳家寶「創造王冠」？

招募鄰居家的孩子，為他們分配建造或作戰任務，花費金幣建設王國，再修建城牆和防禦砲塔。晚上時務必多加小心，貪婪生物將趁著夜幕對你發動無情襲擊。要是丟掉王冠，麻煩就大了！

《Kingdom》系列的每部作品都會藏有各種祕密。仔細探索場景，解鎖坐騎，發現技術升級與武器，還要如何學習合理統籌資源，才能生存下去。

《Kingdom》系列新舊玩家都不容錯過的作品

《Kingdom Eighties》以本系列為人熟知的遊戲機制為基礎，大幅度豐富這系列的敘事與世界觀。即便是初次接觸《Kingdom》系列，劇情元素也會流暢地引導你瞭解遊戲的各項機制。

認識你的小夥伴

你將陸續認識三位配角：切普、緹克兒和烏茲，三人各有各的本領，可以助你解謎破關。

炫酷上路

夏令營只是一切的開始！你將前往《Kingdom》系列從未出現過的地方，去滑板公園找新輪子，光顧大街上的商店，趕走新國度購物中心的貪婪生物。

當像素美術遇上合成波音樂

《Kingdom》系列經典的手繪美術風格回來了，這次還直接參考了80年代的霓虹美學。伴著 Andreas Hald 創作的合成波原聲樂，回到隨心騎車和夏令營的美妙時代，回到一切似乎皆有可能的從前。

mo.releaseNotes:
• 新遊戲模式：限時活動。十週年君主週年慶活動將於遊戲中開放，為期一個月。
• 介面經過全面翻新，部分選項的位置有所調整，瀏覽起來更簡潔。
• 狗狗也能學會新把戲，使其更不容易被抓，並可偵測復仇攻擊的來襲方向。
• 新增視覺效果，加強狗的吠叫動畫。
• 修正了某些情況下已付款卻無法砍伐樹木的問題。
• 微調畫面、聲音、平衡性和介面。
mo.description:
神祕的面紗籠罩著這片未知的中世紀大地，古老的紀念碑、遺跡和神話般的生物在此等待你的到來。往昔時代的回音訴說著過去的偉大，《Kingdom Two Crowns》是屢獲殊榮的《Kingdom》系列遊戲的一部分，你將化身君主，踏上冒險之旅。在這趟橫軸冒險旅程中，騎上坐騎，徵召忠誠的臣民，建設你的王國，同時還得保護王冠不被貪婪生物奪走——這些駭人的怪物滿心想著將王國的寶藏偷個一乾二淨。

建造
建造高聳的城牆和瞭望塔，為強大王國奠定基礎，同時建造農場、徵召村民，使王國欣欣向榮。在《Kingdom Two Crowns》中，你可以開疆闢土、增強國力，逐步獲得新的臣民兵將和技術。
  
探索
探索疆域以外的未知之地，穿過偏僻的森林和古老的廢墟，尋找寶藏和隱藏的知識，協助你一路冒險。誰知道你會發現什麼傳奇神器或神話生靈呢？

防禦
隨著夜幕降臨，暗影開始甦醒，駭人的貪婪生物也將襲擊你的王國。召集軍隊、鼓起勇氣、磨練自己，你必須不斷增長自身的戰術技巧，才有望夜復一夜地保住性命。部署弓箭手、騎士、攻城武器，甚至是新獲得的君主能力和神器，抵禦一波又一波襲來的貪婪生物。 

征服
你作為一國之君，需要親自率軍攻擊貪婪生物的源頭，才能保護轄下諸島。派遣麾下部隊挺身迎敵。注意：請確保你的軍隊兵精糧足，因為貪婪生物不會不戰而降。  

未知的島嶼
《Kingdom Two Crowns》帶給玩家不斷進化的遊戲體驗，包含幾項免費內容更新：

• 《Shogun》：造訪新國度，探索以日本封建時代的文化與建築為靈感的場景。成為強大的幕府將軍或女武士，謀取忍者支持、駕馭傳說中的麒麟來率領部隊作戰，並運籌帷幄，無畏面對躲在重重竹林內的敵人。

• 《Dead Lands》：深入王國的黑暗之地。化身成獨一無二、擁有強大特質的君主，例如哥德式恐怖動作RPG遊戲《血咒之城：暗夜儀式》的碎片人米利暗。

• 挑戰島：對於久經沙場的老練君主來說，這是有史以來最大的挑戰。迎接五項規則和目標各不相同的挑戰。你能活得夠久，奪得最終的金王冠嗎？

還可透過 App 內購取得新的 DLC：

• 《Norse Lands》：在這款維京主題的擴充內容裡仰仗北歐諸神的力量、指揮彪悍的軍隊，打造維京風格的兵械，並破解謎題吧。

• 《Call of Olympus》：進入以古希臘為背景的大型擴充內容，探索古老傳說中的島嶼，尋求眾神恩典，抵禦陣容空前的貪婪生物大軍。

你的冒險才剛剛開始。君主啊，請保持警戒，因為黑夜就要來臨，保護好你的王冠！

mo.trackName: Planit巧攝專業版：风光攝影計劃神器
mo.releaseNotes:
當其他五個曝光參數變成自動的時候，曝光補償會被清零。
修復了無法選擇蘋果地圖和百度地圖的問題。
修復了國內谷歌地圖定位的問題。
修復了我的購買記錄下面機位探索訂閱顯示順序不對的問題。
修復了無法導入一些模型檔案的問題。
修復了共享標記被限制在100個的問題。
修復了星星列表下面選擇一顆星星會旋轉地圖的問題。
修復了反射式測光表選擇照片後鎖死的問題。
mo.description:
請訂閱PlanItPhoto微信公衆號，檢視更多的精彩文章和教程。我們的另外有個免費應用巧攝現場版也已經發布。

44集免費中文視頻教學：
YouTube:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbfOTOEQhi3klBpHP952Y9je
嗶哩嗶哩：
https://space.bilibili.com/382927099/channel/seriesdetail?sid=2490499

另外我們還有20個小時的收費直播課。歡迎訂閱我們的微信公衆號瞭解更多資訊。

也許您正在尋找一個這樣的應用，可以說明您計劃風光攝影的各種細節。那恭喜您，真的不用再找了，巧攝專業版就是夢寐以求的應用。不管您喜歡風光攝影的哪個方面，旅遊，城市，自然，夜景，星空，銀河，星軌，縮時，這個應用都可以說明到您。

著名美國攝影師安塞爾•亞當斯在他的第一本書《Taos Pueblo》強調了“可視化”的概念。他提出“預可視化”，也就是說攝影師應該在按下快門之前就想像出最後出來的照片會使怎樣。當然，很多偉大的照片是即興拍攝出來的，但是對於風光攝影師來說，如果可以提前預見到場景的樣子會很大程度上避免因爲沒有準備好而錯失良機，也會大大增加出好片的機會。

現在科技發達，攝影師可以使用很多不同的工具實現場景的預可視化。當然，手機應用就是很多這樣的工具之一，而且越來越流行。我們這個巧攝專業版就是這樣的一個全功能的應用。它巧妙地利用地圖結合各種攝影工具和日月銀河星曆功能，來實現場景預可視化。

在這個看似簡單的應用裏面，我們加了很多的功能。比如說任何地點的GPS座標、海拔高度、兩點距離、海拔高度差、以及從某一點是否可以看到某個景點。這些資訊不單對攝影師，可能對很多熱愛旅遊的人來說，都是重要的。而對攝影師，我們還專門提供了焦距（水平方向和垂直方向），景深、超焦距和全景工具。不僅如此，我們還加入了星曆錶的功能。這樣您就可以查到任何一天任何地點的日出日落時間、月出月落時間、曙暮光開始結束時間、黃金時段、藍色時段。甚至任何時刻的太陽和月亮的位置你都可以查到。還有星星、星座、銀河、星雲的位置。另外還有星軌計算器和縮時攝影計算器功能，曝光自動計算，ND濾鏡計算器，光度計，彩虹位置預測，部分國家的潮汐資料。可以說是風光攝影需要的功能，應有盡有。和其它類似應用不同的是我們這個應用把上面提到的所有功能都在地圖上或者取景框方式下直觀地顯示出來，各個功能之間還可以結合使用。

風光攝影是我們對自然界的探險。 我們知道您在外面探索時，可能會沒有任何網路。 巧攝專業版當然知道這個，所以只要您預裝離線海拔檔案和離線mbtiles地圖，您可以完全離線使用該應用程式，而無需網路連接。

許可協議：https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
隱私聲明：https://planitphoto.cn/privacy.html

mo.releaseNotes: - 更新：更新商店頁面中的遊戲描述。
mo.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

--

● 在 Twitter 上追蹤我們
https://twitter.com/nekolyst
● 在 Facebook 上幫我們點讚
https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst
● 加入我們的 Discord 群組
https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

mo.description:
《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？

 - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！

 - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。

- 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。

 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。

 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。

 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。

 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

mo.releaseNotes:
更新 1.7：過去的陰影

來自一處被遺忘的設施的微弱無線電訊號或許能拯救文明的未來。但要抵達那裡，勇敢的倖存者必須深入舊世界致命的核心……

- 新戰役：在廢墟中發現被遺忘的研究實驗室，共 10 個新關卡
- 感染邊境：對抗籠罩該區域的遠端感染
- 文明擴張：利用前哨據點提升你的定居點，並新增建築、人口與科技等級
mo.description:
瘟疫公司之后会发生什么？

你能在僵尸启示录之后重建文明吗？瘟疫公司》是一款融合了战略模拟、生存城市建设和 "迷你 4X "的独特游戏。

在 Necroa 病毒肆虐人类数十年后，少数幸存者出现了。在塑造末世社会的过程中，您可以建造定居点、探索、搜刮资源并进行扩张。世界是绿色和美丽的，但危险潜伏在废墟之中！


瘟疫公司》是有史以来最受欢迎的游戏之一，拥有超过 1.9 亿玩家。After Inc. 画面精美，玩法广受好评，是一款引人入胜、简单易学的游戏。建立多个定居点，在持久的战役中获得能力，带领人类走出黑暗。

公益广告：与我们的其他游戏不同，我很高兴地说，《After Inc.现在还不用担心现实生活中的僵尸启示录... 


瘟疫公司》之后会发生什么？

功能：
做出艰难的决定--孩子是负担不起的奢侈品吗？狗是宠物还是食物来源？民主还是专制？
探索美丽的末世后的英国
● 利用过去的废墟搜刮/收获资源
● 用住房、农场、伐木场等扩建您的定居点、
● 消灭僵尸侵扰，保卫人类
● 发掘古老技术，研究新技术
● 塑造你的社会，提供服务，让你的人民幸福
● 在持久战役中建立多个定居点，提升能力等级
● 基于真实生活研究的超逼真僵尸行为建模… ：P
● 由您的决定决定复杂的叙事算法
● 5 个具有完全不同能力的独特领袖
● 不需要互联网连接
● 没有 "消耗性微交易"。扩展包'一次购买，永久畅玩'
● 将在未来数年内不断更新。

特价销售，庆祝游戏上市！


◈◈◈


我有很多更新计划！请与我联系，告诉我您想看到什么。

詹姆斯（设计师）


联系我：

www.ndemiccreations.com/en/1-support
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

mo.releaseNotes:
為了將您的體驗提升到全新層次，我們帶來了三項令人驚艷的新功能：
• 強化版 VoiceOver：提供更清晰、詳盡的描述，讓視障使用者操作更方便。
• 智慧預測搜尋：即時建議，幫助您在數秒內找到想要的內容。
• 新增睡眠計時器：可自動停止播放，讓您在休息或入睡時更安心。
mo.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：
• 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。
• 浮動播放（畫中畫）：在觀看視頻時使用其他應用。
• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。
• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：
• 可切換字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 質量選擇和全屏模式

tw.description:
HUDDLE UP FOR BACKYARD FOOTBALL

Backyard Football 1999 is now enhanced to run on modern systems. Whether you're picking Jerry Rice or Barry Sanders for your dream team, rushing with Pete Wheeler, scoring touchdowns with Pablo Sanchez, or enjoying the witty banter of hosts Sunny Day and Chuck Downfield, simple controls let anyone pick up and play football!

GAME MODES
Single Game: With 5 backyard fields and unique weather condition settings, players can pick their team, design their team logos, and play a pick-up game!
Season Mode: Players can draft seven players from the 30 iconic Backyard Sports characters and a collection of legendary pros including Barry Sanders, Jerry Rice, John Elway, Dan Marino, Randall Cunningham, Drew Bledsoe and Steve Young to compete against 15 other teams in the Backyard Football League. Each team plays a 14-game season. By the end of the regular season, the 4 division champions and 4 wild card teams enter the Backyard Football League Playoffs to compete for the Super Colossal Cereal Bowl!

EARN CLASSIC POWER UPS
Earn power-ups by completing passes on offense and sacking the opposing QB on defense.

Offensive
• Hocus Pocus – A pass play which results in a receiver teleporting down field.
• Sonic Boom – A run play which causes an earthquake to knock over the opposing team.
• Leap Frog – A run play which causes your running back to leap down field.
• Super Punt – A very powerful punt!

Defensive
• Cough Drop – A play that causes the opponent to fumble when tackled.
• Chameleon – A trick play that results in your team wearing the other team's colors for ultimate confusion.
• Spring Loaded – A play that causes your player to leap over the line of scrimmage to sack the QB.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. However, Backyard Football ‘99 runs well, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez!
Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master!
Game Modes:
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)!
Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball!
T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field!
 
BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES
The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules:
No leading off
No Injuries
Bunting is allowed
Tagging up is allowed
Stealing is allowed
 
At our core, we are fans first–not just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.

tw.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

tw.description:
An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets.

Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, or use two thumbs like a traditional controller. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket.


About the Author:
Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

tw.description:
《Kingdom Eighties》為獲獎遊戲《Kingdom》系列的獨立擴充，以80年代霓虹元素為靈感，帶你踏上壯闊的輕策略基地建造單人冒險之旅。

你將化身夏令營的年輕輔導員「老大」，抵禦神祕貪婪生物的無情攻擊，保護自己的家人和小鎮。這些怪物是什麼來頭，為什麼想搶走你的傳家寶「創造王冠」？

招募鄰居家的孩子，為他們分配建造或作戰任務，花費金幣建設王國，再修建城牆和防禦砲塔。晚上時務必多加小心，貪婪生物將趁著夜幕對你發動無情襲擊。要是丟掉王冠，麻煩就大了！

《Kingdom》系列的每部作品都會藏有各種祕密。仔細探索場景，解鎖坐騎，發現技術升級與武器，還要如何學習合理統籌資源，才能生存下去。

《Kingdom》系列新舊玩家都不容錯過的作品

《Kingdom Eighties》以本系列為人熟知的遊戲機制為基礎，大幅度豐富這系列的敘事與世界觀。即便是初次接觸《Kingdom》系列，劇情元素也會流暢地引導你瞭解遊戲的各項機制。

認識你的小夥伴

你將陸續認識三位配角：切普、緹克兒和烏茲，三人各有各的本領，可以助你解謎破關。

炫酷上路

夏令營只是一切的開始！你將前往《Kingdom》系列從未出現過的地方，去滑板公園找新輪子，光顧大街上的商店，趕走新國度購物中心的貪婪生物。

當像素美術遇上合成波音樂

《Kingdom》系列經典的手繪美術風格回來了，這次還直接參考了80年代的霓虹美學。伴著 Andreas Hald 創作的合成波原聲樂，回到隨心騎車和夏令營的美妙時代，回到一切似乎皆有可能的從前。

tw.releaseNotes:
• 新遊戲模式：限時活動。十週年君主週年慶活動將於遊戲中開放，為期一個月。
• 介面經過全面翻新，部分選項的位置有所調整，瀏覽起來更簡潔。
• 狗狗也能學會新把戲，使其更不容易被抓，並可偵測復仇攻擊的來襲方向。
• 新增視覺效果，加強狗的吠叫動畫。
• 修正了某些情況下已付款卻無法砍伐樹木的問題。
• 微調畫面、聲音、平衡性和介面。
tw.description:
神祕的面紗籠罩著這片未知的中世紀大地，古老的紀念碑、遺跡和神話般的生物在此等待你的到來。往昔時代的回音訴說著過去的偉大，《Kingdom Two Crowns》是屢獲殊榮的《Kingdom》系列遊戲的一部分，你將化身君主，踏上冒險之旅。在這趟橫軸冒險旅程中，騎上坐騎，徵召忠誠的臣民，建設你的王國，同時還得保護王冠不被貪婪生物奪走——這些駭人的怪物滿心想著將王國的寶藏偷個一乾二淨。

建造
建造高聳的城牆和瞭望塔，為強大王國奠定基礎，同時建造農場、徵召村民，使王國欣欣向榮。在《Kingdom Two Crowns》中，你可以開疆闢土、增強國力，逐步獲得新的臣民兵將和技術。
  
探索
探索疆域以外的未知之地，穿過偏僻的森林和古老的廢墟，尋找寶藏和隱藏的知識，協助你一路冒險。誰知道你會發現什麼傳奇神器或神話生靈呢？

防禦
隨著夜幕降臨，暗影開始甦醒，駭人的貪婪生物也將襲擊你的王國。召集軍隊、鼓起勇氣、磨練自己，你必須不斷增長自身的戰術技巧，才有望夜復一夜地保住性命。部署弓箭手、騎士、攻城武器，甚至是新獲得的君主能力和神器，抵禦一波又一波襲來的貪婪生物。 

征服
你作為一國之君，需要親自率軍攻擊貪婪生物的源頭，才能保護轄下諸島。派遣麾下部隊挺身迎敵。注意：請確保你的軍隊兵精糧足，因為貪婪生物不會不戰而降。  

未知的島嶼
《Kingdom Two Crowns》帶給玩家不斷進化的遊戲體驗，包含幾項免費內容更新：

• 《Shogun》：造訪新國度，探索以日本封建時代的文化與建築為靈感的場景。成為強大的幕府將軍或女武士，謀取忍者支持、駕馭傳說中的麒麟來率領部隊作戰，並運籌帷幄，無畏面對躲在重重竹林內的敵人。

• 《Dead Lands》：深入王國的黑暗之地。化身成獨一無二、擁有強大特質的君主，例如哥德式恐怖動作RPG遊戲《血咒之城：暗夜儀式》的碎片人米利暗。

• 挑戰島：對於久經沙場的老練君主來說，這是有史以來最大的挑戰。迎接五項規則和目標各不相同的挑戰。你能活得夠久，奪得最終的金王冠嗎？

還可透過 App 內購取得新的 DLC：

• 《Norse Lands》：在這款維京主題的擴充內容裡仰仗北歐諸神的力量、指揮彪悍的軍隊，打造維京風格的兵械，並破解謎題吧。

• 《Call of Olympus》：進入以古希臘為背景的大型擴充內容，探索古老傳說中的島嶼，尋求眾神恩典，抵禦陣容空前的貪婪生物大軍。

你的冒險才剛剛開始。君主啊，請保持警戒，因為黑夜就要來臨，保護好你的王冠！

tw.releaseNotes:

We have been busy eliminating bugs, enriching features and providing you with investment opportunities!
And we’ve got a new limited-time event running in MONOPOLY!


Log in and check it out today!
tw.description:
Play MONOPOLY on the go without distractions – no ads, no fuss! 

Challenge friends, family and fans from around the globe in the digital version of the official MONOPOLY board game, licensed by Hasbro. 

Head online to play your favourite board game with anyone, anywhere, at any time, or compete against state-of-the-art AI opponents offline. Plus, with the seamless PASS & PLAY mode, you can play the classic MONOPOLY board game with your friends with just one device! 

The classic MONOPOLY board game takes a bold leap into a new format, arriving on mobile with amazing graphics, smooth animations and a catchy soundtrack! 


HOW TO PLAY MONOPOLY

1. Download the official MONOPOLY app
2. Press “PLAY”
3. Pick a mode, board, dice and token
4. Roll the dice and move around the board
5. If you land on a property tile, you can buy it
6. Collect rent when other players land on it
7. Continue around the board, drawing cards when instructed – will you be hit with a surprise tax? Sent to jail? Or get a little bonus money? 
8. If you run out of money, you’ll be bankrupt and out of the game
9. The last player left with a profit wins! 

FEATURES

- MONOPOLY ON THE GO – No connection? No problem. Our roster of AI opponents are ready to challenge you! Or play with your friends offline with Pass & Play! 
- MULTIPLE MODES – Take on AI opponents in Single Player or compete against friends and family in Pass & Play or Online With Friends. Try out Online Multiplayer and face off against fellow tycoons from around the world! 
- EXCLUSIVE BOARDS – Experience the iconic board game like never before with exclusive boards and more! 
- AWESOME NEW TOKENS AND DICE – Whatever your style, MONOPOLY has a set of dice fit for a future tycoon! Pick from nostalgic classic tokens or brand-new designs exclusive to the mobile game.

Get the most authentic MONOPOLY experience with the official MONOPOLY mobile game!

The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the gameboard, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment. © 1935, 2025 Hasbro. tw.releaseNotes:

tw.description:
請訂閱PlanItPhoto微信公衆號，檢視更多的精彩文章和教程。我們的另外有個免費應用巧攝現場版也已經發布。

44集免費中文視頻教學：
YouTube:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbfOTOEQhi3klBpHP952Y9je
嗶哩嗶哩：
https://space.bilibili.com/382927099/channel/seriesdetail?sid=2490499

另外我們還有20個小時的收費直播課。歡迎訂閱我們的微信公衆號瞭解更多資訊。

也許您正在尋找一個這樣的應用，可以說明您計劃風光攝影的各種細節。那恭喜您，真的不用再找了，巧攝專業版就是夢寐以求的應用。不管您喜歡風光攝影的哪個方面，旅遊，城市，自然，夜景，星空，銀河，星軌，縮時，這個應用都可以說明到您。

著名美國攝影師安塞爾•亞當斯在他的第一本書《Taos Pueblo》強調了“可視化”的概念。他提出“預可視化”，也就是說攝影師應該在按下快門之前就想像出最後出來的照片會使怎樣。當然，很多偉大的照片是即興拍攝出來的，但是對於風光攝影師來說，如果可以提前預見到場景的樣子會很大程度上避免因爲沒有準備好而錯失良機，也會大大增加出好片的機會。

現在科技發達，攝影師可以使用很多不同的工具實現場景的預可視化。當然，手機應用就是很多這樣的工具之一，而且越來越流行。我們這個巧攝專業版就是這樣的一個全功能的應用。它巧妙地利用地圖結合各種攝影工具和日月銀河星曆功能，來實現場景預可視化。

在這個看似簡單的應用裏面，我們加了很多的功能。比如說任何地點的GPS座標、海拔高度、兩點距離、海拔高度差、以及從某一點是否可以看到某個景點。這些資訊不單對攝影師，可能對很多熱愛旅遊的人來說，都是重要的。而對攝影師，我們還專門提供了焦距（水平方向和垂直方向），景深、超焦距和全景工具。不僅如此，我們還加入了星曆錶的功能。這樣您就可以查到任何一天任何地點的日出日落時間、月出月落時間、曙暮光開始結束時間、黃金時段、藍色時段。甚至任何時刻的太陽和月亮的位置你都可以查到。還有星星、星座、銀河、星雲的位置。另外還有星軌計算器和縮時攝影計算器功能，曝光自動計算，ND濾鏡計算器，光度計，彩虹位置預測，部分國家的潮汐資料。可以說是風光攝影需要的功能，應有盡有。和其它類似應用不同的是我們這個應用把上面提到的所有功能都在地圖上或者取景框方式下直觀地顯示出來，各個功能之間還可以結合使用。

風光攝影是我們對自然界的探險。 我們知道您在外面探索時，可能會沒有任何網路。 巧攝專業版當然知道這個，所以只要您預裝離線海拔檔案和離線mbtiles地圖，您可以完全離線使用該應用程式，而無需網路連接。

許可協議：https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
隱私聲明：https://planitphoto.cn/privacy.html

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

tw.description:
《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？

 - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！

 - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。

- 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。

 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。

 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。

 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。

 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

更新 1.7：過去的陰影

來自一處被遺忘的設施的微弱無線電訊號或許能拯救文明的未來。但要抵達那裡，勇敢的倖存者必須深入舊世界致命的核心……

- 新戰役：在廢墟中發現被遺忘的研究實驗室，共 10 個新關卡
- 感染邊境：對抗籠罩該區域的遠端感染
- 文明擴張：利用前哨據點提升你的定居點，並新增建築、人口與科技等級
tw.description:
瘟疫公司之后会发生什么？

你能在僵尸启示录之后重建文明吗？瘟疫公司》是一款融合了战略模拟、生存城市建设和 "迷你 4X "的独特游戏。

在 Necroa 病毒肆虐人类数十年后，少数幸存者出现了。在塑造末世社会的过程中，您可以建造定居点、探索、搜刮资源并进行扩张。世界是绿色和美丽的，但危险潜伏在废墟之中！


瘟疫公司》是有史以来最受欢迎的游戏之一，拥有超过 1.9 亿玩家。After Inc. 画面精美，玩法广受好评，是一款引人入胜、简单易学的游戏。建立多个定居点，在持久的战役中获得能力，带领人类走出黑暗。

公益广告：与我们的其他游戏不同，我很高兴地说，《After Inc.现在还不用担心现实生活中的僵尸启示录... 


瘟疫公司》之后会发生什么？

功能：
做出艰难的决定--孩子是负担不起的奢侈品吗？狗是宠物还是食物来源？民主还是专制？
探索美丽的末世后的英国
● 利用过去的废墟搜刮/收获资源
● 用住房、农场、伐木场等扩建您的定居点、
● 消灭僵尸侵扰，保卫人类
● 发掘古老技术，研究新技术
● 塑造你的社会，提供服务，让你的人民幸福
● 在持久战役中建立多个定居点，提升能力等级
● 基于真实生活研究的超逼真僵尸行为建模… ：P
● 由您的决定决定复杂的叙事算法
● 5 个具有完全不同能力的独特领袖
● 不需要互联网连接
● 没有 "消耗性微交易"。扩展包'一次购买，永久畅玩'
● 将在未来数年内不断更新。

特价销售，庆祝游戏上市！


◈◈◈


我有很多更新计划！请与我联系，告诉我您想看到什么。

詹姆斯（设计师）


联系我：

www.ndemiccreations.com/en/1-support
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！

us.description:
HUDDLE UP FOR BACKYARD FOOTBALL

Backyard Football 1999 is now enhanced to run on modern systems. Whether you're picking Jerry Rice or Barry Sanders for your dream team, rushing with Pete Wheeler, scoring touchdowns with Pablo Sanchez, or enjoying the witty banter of hosts Sunny Day and Chuck Downfield, simple controls let anyone pick up and play football!

GAME MODES
Single Game: With 5 backyard fields and unique weather condition settings, players can pick their team, design their team logos, and play a pick-up game!
Season Mode: Players can draft seven players from the 30 iconic Backyard Sports characters and a collection of legendary pros including Barry Sanders, Jerry Rice, John Elway, Dan Marino, Randall Cunningham, Drew Bledsoe and Steve Young to compete against 15 other teams in the Backyard Football League. Each team plays a 14-game season. By the end of the regular season, the 4 division champions and 4 wild card teams enter the Backyard Football League Playoffs to compete for the Super Colossal Cereal Bowl!

EARN CLASSIC POWER UPS
Earn power-ups by completing passes on offense and sacking the opposing QB on defense.

Offensive
• Hocus Pocus – A pass play which results in a receiver teleporting down field.
• Sonic Boom – A run play which causes an earthquake to knock over the opposing team.
• Leap Frog – A run play which causes your running back to leap down field.
• Super Punt – A very powerful punt!

Defensive
• Cough Drop – A play that causes the opponent to fumble when tackled.
• Chameleon – A trick play that results in your team wearing the other team's colors for ultimate confusion.
• Spring Loaded – A play that causes your player to leap over the line of scrimmage to sack the QB.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. However, Backyard Football ‘99 runs well, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

us.description:
An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets.

Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, or use two thumbs like a traditional controller. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket.


About the Author:
Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez!
Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master!
Game Modes:
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)!
Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball!
T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field!
 
BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES
The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules:
No leading off
No Injuries
Bunting is allowed
Tagging up is allowed
Stealing is allowed
 
At our core, we are fans first–not just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.

us.description:
RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities.

Whether you’re scanning for a mesocyclone’s tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricane’s eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radar’s scanning strategy.

Your initial app purchase includes the following:

• Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany
• 6-frame radar loops
• Two built-in providers for radar data
• Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US
• Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia
• NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes
• Inspector and distance tools
• Color palette options for radar data
• AllisonHouse data plan integration
• Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting
• mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL
• Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use
• Support for widgets and complications
• Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather:

• 30-frame radar loops
• Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes
• Severe weather watches in the US and Canada
• Special weather statements in the US and Canada
• Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions
• SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks
• WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US
• Local storm reports in the US
• Custom color palette support
• Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices)
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including:

• Everything in Pro Tier One
• 50-frame radar loops
• A third provider for US radar data
• NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive
• Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive
• Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive
• GOES East and GOES West satellite products
• NSSL’s Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products
• NCEP’s Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products
• Surface observations
• Atmospheric soundings in the US
• Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive
• More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps
• Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA
• Server-sent events for radar and warning updates
• Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices
• Family sharing support

If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period.

Please visit our web site for more information.

us.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

us.description:
Evoland is an action adventure game that takes you on a journey through the history of classic adventure and RPG gaming.

As you progress through the game, you unlock new technologies, gameplay systems and ever-improving graphics. From monochrome to full 3D graphics and from turn-based battles to real-time boss fights, Evoland makes you live the evolution of adventure gaming – all with plenty of humour and nods to moments from classic games.

 - Play through the history of action-adventure video games
 - Discover many evolutions, from old school 2D action/adventure to active time battles and full 3D action
 - Revisit the starting area rendered in full 3D or explore the overworld with your own airship!
 - And have fun with the dungeons, puzzles, a heap of secrets to uncover, and hundreds of achievements and stars to collect

Check out the official website at evoland.shirogames.com
Follow us on Twitter @playdigious
Like us on Facebook /playdigious

If you experience any problem with Evoland, please contact our customer support team at playdigious@gmail.com. Don't forget to specify which device and operating system you are using.

us.description:
Kingdom Eighties is a standalone expansion to the award-winning Kingdom series: A singleplayer adventure of micro-strategy and base building, inspired by the neon lights of the eighties. 

You play as The Leader, a young camp counselor who will have to defend their town and family from the relentless attack of the mysterious Greed. What are these monsters, and why are they trying to steal their family legacy, the Crown of Creation?

Recruit the neighborhood kids and assign them roles as soldiers or builders. Use coins to build and expand your kingdom, and fortify it by raising walls and defensive turrets. And be prepared for when the night comes, for the Greed will attack you without mercy. If you lose your crown, everything is doomed! 

Every game in the Kingdom series holds secrets. Explore the surroundings to unlock mounts, discover technology upgrades and weapons, and learn how to manage your resources wisely to survive.

A KINGDOM GAME FOR VETERANS AND NEWCOMERS

Building upon the well-known mechanics from the previous Kingdom games, Kingdom Eighties will deep dive into the lore and worldbuilding of the series. And if you're new to it, the story elements will fluently guide you through the gameplay mechanics. 

MEET YOUR COMPANIONS

You will meet three supporting characters along the way: The Champ, The Tinkerer, and The Wiz. Each one has different abilities that you can combine to solve puzzles and find the solution to each level. 

HIT THE STREETS IN STYLE

The summer camp is just the beginning! You will travel through different locations never seen before in the Kingdom series. Find some fresh wheels at the skateboard park, visit the shops on Main Street, and free the New Lands Mall from the Greed.

PIXEL ART MEETS SYNTH

Kingdom's iconic, handcrafted art style is back, now with a neon touch coming directly from the eighties aesthetics. Chill and vibe with the synthwave OST from Andreas Hald, and travel back to the wonder days of bike riding and summer camps, when everything seemed possible.

us.description:
A shroud of mystery envelops these uncharted medieval lands where ancient monuments, relics and mythical creatures await. Echoes of bygone eras speak of past greatness and in Kingdom Two Crowns, part of the award-winning franchise Kingdom, you embark on an adventure as the Monarch. In this side-scrolling journey atop your steed, you recruit loyal subjects, build your Kingdom and protect your crown from the Greed, monstrous creatures looking to steal your Kingdom's treasures. 

BUILD
Lay the foundation of a mighty Kingdom with towering walls, protecting towers while cultivating prosperity through building farms and recruiting villagers. In Kingdom Two Crowns expanding and growing your Kingdom grants access to new units and technologies.  

EXPLORE
Venture into the unknown beyond the protection of your borders, through secluded forests and ancient ruins to seek treasures and hidden knowledge to aid your quest. Who knows what legendary artifacts or mythological beings you will find. 

DEFEND
As the night falls, shadows come to life and the monstrous Greed assault your kingdom. Rally your troops, muster your courage, and steel yourself, for each night will demand ever-growing feats of tactical mastermind. Deploy archers, knights, siege weapons, and even newfound Monarch abilities and artifacts to hold against the waves of Greed. 

CONQUER
As the Monarch, lead assaults against the source of the Greed to secure your islands. Send your groups of soldiers to clash with the enemy. A word of caution: make sure your troops are prepared and sufficient in numbers, as the Greed will not go down without a fight.  

UNCHARTED ISLES
Kingdom Two Crowns is an evolving experience that includes several free content updates:

• Shogun: Journey to lands inspired by the architecture and culture of feudal Japan. Play as the mighty Shogun or Onna-bugeisha, enlist the ninja, lead your soldiers to battle atop the mythological Kirin, and form new strategies as you brave the Greed hiding in thick bamboo forests. 

• Dead Lands: Enter the dark lands of Kingdom. Play as unique Monarchs, including the Shardbinder Miriam, with powerful traits from the gothic horror action-RPG Bloodstained. 

• Challenge Islands: Representing the greatest challenge ever seen for hardened veteran monarchs.  Take on five challenges with different rules and objectives. Can you survive long enough to claim the gold crown?  

Additional DLC available via in-app purchase:

• Norse Lands: Set in a domain inspired by Norse Viking culture 1000 C.E, the Norse Lands DLC is a full new campaign that expands the world of Kingdom Two Crowns with a unique setting to build, defend, explore, and conquer.

• Call of Olympus: Explore islands of ancient legends and mythos, seek the favors of the gods to challenge and defend against Greed of epic scales in this major expansion. 

Your adventure is only the beginning. Oh Monarch, stay vigilant for dark nights are still to come, protect your crown!

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

us.description:
Dive into a deep story of corruption, crime and intrigue. Take the role of gritty Police Chief Jack Boyd, and come face to face with the ugly underbelly of Freeburg, a city spiraling the drain. Will Jack reach his retirement with a nice stack of bills, or will he end up broken ... or worse? 

Manage your staff, respond to emergencies, and investigate crimes in a city on the brink of chaos. The mafia underworld maneuvers behind the scenes, sinking their claws ever deeper into the city, even as the mayor is ready to exploit every situation to his political advantage. 

Choose your approach to each situation as it unfolds. Sometimes you’ll be responding to a developing crisis at a crime scene, or negotiating with Freeburg’s crime bosses. Sometimes you’ll find yourself dodging questions in the press room, or even the occasional cross-examination in the witness box. Can you keep this pressure cooker from exploding, at least for long enough to stash away a nice retirement nest egg?

- Your mission is clear: make $500,000 in 180 days before Jack Boyd reaches retirement. How? That’s up to you!

- Decisions, decisions! This Is the Police is all about a dark story and how you react to it. Whatever you decide, your choices will influence the game – and the fate of Jack Boyd.

- The Good, the Bad, and... the Ugly? The Chief of Freeburg's Police Department deals with all kind of people. It is up to you to find the bad guys and decide how to deal with them.

- Carry out your duties. As head of Freeburg PD, Jack deals with all sorts of challenges every day: responding to emergencies, managing his officers, defending the department against City Hall and a corrupt mayor, and much more.

- Solve Investigations and gather evidence against the criminal gangs of Freeburg.

- Deal with the competing powers of the city. Everyone offers you favors, and each one comes at a price.
Rich and fully voiced story: Jack Boyd is portrayed by Jon St. John, the voice of Duke Nukem.

us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

us.description:
Please email info@planitphoto.com for bug reports or feature requests. Please also remember to visit https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbcn1Fd1NRWTOczTY1RYEug4 for more video tutorials. Each video only lasts a few minutes but you will surely learn a lot from them. You can also reach us through Instagram. Links are under the menu inside the app.

This is a special call to landscape photographers, travel photographers, nature photographers, and those who are interested in night photography, city photography, time-lapse, star-trails, milky way or astrophotography: look no more, this is the ultimate app for you - the Planit Pro. It only costs you a cup of Frappuccino but will save you tons of time and effort and a lot of gas money. Most importantly, it will make you enjoy landscape photography even more.

Ansel Adams dedicates the beginning of his first book "Taos Pueblo" to visualization. He introduced the idea of "previsualization", which involved the photographer imagining what he wanted his final print to look like before he even took the photo. Of course, there are many great photos that were taken impromptu. However, for landscape photographers, being able to previsualize the scene before going there will greatly reduce the chance of being caught unprepared and will greatly increase the chance of getting better photos.

Photographers use various tools to help them pre-visualizing the scene. Nowadays, many of those tools are phone apps. Planit Pro is an all-in-one solution that is designed to leverage the map and simulated viewfinder technologies to provide the necessary tools for photographers to pre-visualize the scene in combination with the ground subjects and the celestial objects such as the Sun, the Moon, Stars, Star-trails and Milky Way.

In the Planit Pro app, we packed it with features - from location scouting such as GPS coordinates, elevations, distance, elevation gain, clear view, focal length, depth of field (DoF), hyperfocal distance, panorama, and aerial photography, to the Ephemeris features such as the sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset time and direction, twilight time, special hours of the day, sun/moon finder, major stars, constellations, nebulae azimuth and elevation angle, star trail planning, time-lapse calculation and simulation, sequence calculation and simulation, milky way searching, solar eclipse and lunar eclipse, exposure/ND filter calculator, light meter, rainbow position prediction, tide height, and tide search, etc. All the information is either represented on the map as an overlay or visually presented in simulated viewfinders (VR, AR, picture, or street view), just like you look through your camera's viewfinder. Whatever you want for your landscape photography, it is there in the Planit Pro.

Landscape photography is an adventure in the natural world. We understand that sometimes there won't be any network connection when you are out exploring. Planit Pro was designed for having it in mind. If you preload the offline elevation files and the offline mbtiles maps, you can use the app fully offline without the need for network connections.

License agreement at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy at https://planitphoto.com/privacy.html

Can you rebuild civilization after a zombie apocalypse? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique blend of strategic simulation, survival city builder and ‘mini 4X’.

Decades after the Necroa Virus ravaged humanity, a few survivors emerge. Build a settlement, explore, scavenge resources and expand as you shape your post-apocalyptic society. The world is green and beautiful but danger lurks in the ruins!

After Inc. is the brand new game from the creator of ‘Plague Inc.’ - one of the most popular games ever with over 190 million players. Brilliantly executed with beautiful graphics and critically acclaimed gameplay - After Inc. is engaging and easy to learn. Build multiple settlements and gain abilities in a persistent campaign to lead humanity out of the darkness.

Public Service Announcement: Unlike our other games, I’m pleased to say that After Inc. is not based on any real world situation. No need to start worrying about a real life zombie apocalypse yet… 

◈◈◈ What happens after Plague Inc.? ◈◈◈

● Explore a beautiful post-apocalyptic United Kingdom
● Exploit the ruins of the past to scavenge / harvest resources
● Expand your Settlement with housing, farms, lumberyards and much more

● Uncover old technologies and research new ones
● Shape your society and provide services to keep your people happy

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity

Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. 

FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps:
1) Decide on a single task to be done.
2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes).
3) Take a short break (5 minutes).
4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes)

Features
- Elegant minimalist design
- Daily Summary
- Beautiful crafted design themes
- Quotes to inspire and motivate you
- Custom timer duration for your tasks


Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!

tr.description:
HUDDLE UP FOR BACKYARD FOOTBALL

Backyard Football 1999 is now enhanced to run on modern systems. Whether you're picking Jerry Rice or Barry Sanders for your dream team, rushing with Pete Wheeler, scoring touchdowns with Pablo Sanchez, or enjoying the witty banter of hosts Sunny Day and Chuck Downfield, simple controls let anyone pick up and play football!

GAME MODES
Single Game: With 5 backyard fields and unique weather condition settings, players can pick their team, design their team logos, and play a pick-up game!
Season Mode: Players can draft seven players from the 30 iconic Backyard Sports characters and a collection of legendary pros including Barry Sanders, Jerry Rice, John Elway, Dan Marino, Randall Cunningham, Drew Bledsoe and Steve Young to compete against 15 other teams in the Backyard Football League. Each team plays a 14-game season. By the end of the regular season, the 4 division champions and 4 wild card teams enter the Backyard Football League Playoffs to compete for the Super Colossal Cereal Bowl!

EARN CLASSIC POWER UPS
Earn power-ups by completing passes on offense and sacking the opposing QB on defense.

Offensive
• Hocus Pocus – A pass play which results in a receiver teleporting down field.
• Sonic Boom – A run play which causes an earthquake to knock over the opposing team.
• Leap Frog – A run play which causes your running back to leap down field.
• Super Punt – A very powerful punt!

Defensive
• Cough Drop – A play that causes the opponent to fumble when tackled.
• Chameleon – A trick play that results in your team wearing the other team's colors for ultimate confusion.
• Spring Loaded – A play that causes your player to leap over the line of scrimmage to sack the QB.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. However, Backyard Football ‘99 runs well, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.
